thread.title: Twitter is 'too difficult to use', says finance chief
thread.title_full: Twitter is 'too difficult to use', says finance chief

author: AP
title: Twitter is 'too difficult to use', says finance chief
text: Digital Media Twitter is 'too difficult to use', says finance chief Twitter shares drop 10pc as user growth stalls, sparking fears the social network will never reach the audience that Facebook and Google have Twitter had 316m monthly active users in the second quarter, up less than 3pc from the first quarter of this year By AP
